text:
RT @RepMarkMeadows Please share if you agree: it is completely unacceptable to withhold the salary of our military men and women because you want a separate, unrelated DACA deal.

End this now. #SchumerShutdown http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DUBKg4kWsAAM00r.jpg

Republicans: 
✅  Control the House
✅  Control the Senate
✅  Control the presidency 

Do your job. Run the damn government. Pass a budget that protects working families.

We know the #TrumpShutdown is dominating the cycle, but we’re just going to drop this right here. ⬇️⬇️

“Paul Ryan Collected $500,000 In Koch Contributions Days After House Passed #GOPTaxScam” 

http://a.msn.com/01/en-us/AAuWW6J?ocid=st

RT @SenateDems What caused the #TrumpShutdown?
@Peggynoonannyc says @realDonaldTrump is “actually not good at making a deal.” http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DUFg7oFWAAMw3or.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/955150066221797379/vid/320x180/IxYj84ioXFZeTwKa.mp4

This government shutdown is part of the long-term, anti-government ideology paid for by the Koch brothers. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/955209865307279362/img/B-j-OvZ39iyBEFEm.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/955209865307279362/vid/240x240/E77FiyePsc2fh0Tm.mp4

To have a president of the United States who says such outrageous nonsense, it is really sad. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/955161658263003136/img/Suk8fFJbRRk6erOx.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/955161658263003136/vid/240x240/tAd6SbldaZBHNv_Y.mp4

RT @CNNPolitics Sen. Bernie Sanders addresses the Trump campaign’s new ad saying Democrats are complicit for murders committed by undocumented immigrants: “It is really unbelievable and so sad for our country” #CNNSOTU https://trib.al/BXh29ui

.@realDonaldTrump is right. We've voted to fund entire govt; Dems voted to shut it down. If Dems demand amnesty for illegal aliens as the price for reopening the govt & funding our military, we should just change the rules & fund the govt with 51 votes. End the #SchumerShutdown https://twitter.com/realdonaldtrump/status/955056249925750784 QT @realDonaldTrump Great to see how hard Republicans are fighting for our Military and Safety at the Border. The Dems just want illegal immigrants to pour into our nation unchecked. If stalemate continues, Republicans should go to 51% (Nuclear Option) and vote on real, long term budget, no C.R.’s!
What we’ve seen this weekend validates the fact that something has stirred up the women of our country and those who care about women. This is now a movement. #WomensMarch

With the #TrumpShutdown continuing, there was a proposal on the table tonight that would have permanently extended CHIP and kept kids covered. Unfortunately it was blocked. We should all be able to agree that we must do what we can to protect the most vulnerable in our country. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DUHWGLFVAAArST7.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/955278209066479616/vid/320x180/vM7SOyV9rpgUPCXc.mp4

We need to guarantee members of our military and furloughed federal workers will receive the pay they deserve during the shutdown. It’s the right thing to do. 
https://twitter.com/nowthisnews/status/954825373572726784 QT @nowthisnews Watch the moment Sen. Claire McCaskill (D-MO) tried to pass a bill guaranteeing military pay and death benefits during the gov’t shutdown — and GOP leader Mitch McConnell blocked it http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DUA1oebVQAAM2LP.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/954821473989873664/vid/240x240/pIq1yx86Dum8A1cT.mp4

RT @jorge_aguilarDC It’s still the #TrumpShutdown. And yes, Stephen Miller — whose bigoted, hate-filled views environ the White House agenda — still has to go. https://twitter.com/nbcpolitics/status/955261604316229633 QT @NBCPolitics JUST IN: Trump and Schumer’s Friday chat and work towards a deal was derailed by John Kelly and Stephen Miller, whose stance on immigration, coupled with Kelly’s position on defense spending, pushed Trump off any compromise, senior administration official tells @NBCNews

This is not some partisan political game — this is about people's lives. Hundreds of thousands of federal employees are facing furloughs — and many Dreamers are still terrified that they could face deportation. Americans deserve a bipartisan compromise.

Last year at the march in D.C., I said that even if you are not sitting in the White House, even if you don't run a corporate super PAC, you have the power. We’ve proven that to be true. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DUFzGRiUQAAljvH.jpg
